    • Content

      *A HOLDING TANK for recodes i have sent to Markus to incorporate;

*SELF-ESTEEM;
*reverse recodes;
gen se01_r=12-se01;
gen se03_r=12-se03;
gen se04_r=12-se04;
gen se07_r=12-se07;
gen se10_r=12-se10;

*calculate aggregates;
gen self_esteem_composite=(se01_r+se02+se03_r+se04_r+se05+se06+se07_r+se08+se09+se10_r)/10;
replace self_esteem_composite=. if (se01==.)|(se02==.)|(se03==.)|(se04==.)|(se05==.)|(se06==.)|(se07==.)|(se08==.)|(se09==.)|(se10==.);

*LOCUS OF CONTROL;
*reverse recodes;
gen loc01_r=12-loc01;
gen loc02_r=12-loc02;
gen loc03_r=12-loc03;
gen loc04_r=12-loc04;
gen loc05_r=12-loc05;

*calculate aggregates;
gen locus_of_control_composite=(loc01_r+loc02_r+loc03_r+loc04_r+loc05_r+loc06+loc07)/7;
replace locus_of_control_composite=. if (loc01==.)|(loc02==.)|(loc03==.)|(loc04==.)|(loc05==.)|(loc06==.)|(loc07==.);

*SAVOURING;
*reverse recodes;
gen sav01_r = 12-sav01;
gen sav07_r = 12-sav07;
gen sav13_r = 12-sav13;
gen sav19_r = 12-sav19;
gen sav05_r = 12-sav05;
gen sav11_r = 12-sav11;
gen sav17_r = 12-sav17;
gen sav23_r = 12-sav23;
gen sav03_r = 12-sav03;
gen sav09_r = 12-sav09;
gen sav15_r = 12-sav15;
gen sav21_r = 12-sav21;

*calculate aggregates;
gen SBI_anticipate=(sav01_r+sav07_r+sav13_r+sav19_r+sav04+sav10+sav16+sav22)/8;
gen SBI_moment=(sav05_r+sav11_r+sav17_r+sav23_r+sav02+sav08+sav14+sav20)/8;
gen SBI_reminisce=(sav03_r+sav09_r+sav15_r+sav21_r+sav06+sav12+sav18+sav24)/8;
gen SBI_total=(SBI_anticipate+SBI_moment+SBI_reminisce)/3;

replace SBI_total=. if (sav01==.)|(sav07==.)|(sav13==.)|(sav19==.)|(sav04==.)|(sav10==.)|(sav16==.)|(sav22==.)|
(sav05==.)|(sav11==.)|(sav17==.)|(sav23==.)|(sav02==.)|(sav08==.)|(sav14==.)|(sav20==.)|
(sav03==.)|(sav09==.)|(sav15==.)|(sav21==.)|(sav06==.)|(sav12==.)|(sav18==.)|(sav24==.);

replace SBI_anticipate=. if (sav01==.)|(sav07==.)|(sav13==.)|(sav19==.)|(sav04==.)|(sav10==.)|(sav16==.)|(sav22==.);
replace SBI_moment=. if (sav05==.)|(sav11==.)|(sav17==.)|(sav23==.)|(sav02==.)|(sav08==.)|(sav14==.)|(sav20==.);
replace SBI_reminisce=. if (sav03==.)|(sav09==.)|(sav15==.)|(sav21==.)|(sav06==.)|(sav12==.)|(sav18==.)|(sav24==.);
